Text: Re FW Patina Oil Gas Docs Cc Thanks We should know something about the well we are currently reentering next week Timing on the gathering line is still uncertain Whitt Mark Mark NRONcom AM These are draft versions of the interruptible purchase agreement and confirm for your gas into Fort Union Think about what you what to do for term volume etc We will then add in the gathering charges We are pretty flexible so let me know what works for Patina Thanks Mark Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday October PM To Whitt Mark Cc Perlingiere Debra Subject Patina Oil Gas Docs Patina Oil Gas Confirmdoc Patina Oil Gasdoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Re FW Patina Oil Gas Docs Cc Thanks We should know something about the well we are currently reentering next week Timing on the gathering line is still uncertain Whitt Mark Mark NRONcom AM These are draft versions of the interruptible purchase agreement and confirm for your gas into Fort Union Think about what you what to do for term volume etc We will then add in the gathering charges We are pretty flexible so let me know what works for Patina Thanks Mark Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday October PM To Whitt Mark Cc Perlingiere Debra Subject Patina Oil Gas Docs Patina Oil Gas Confirmdoc Patina Oil Gasdoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Re Gas Analysis Cc Nothey have not done a gas analysisbut will certainly pass it along when we have one Bump Dan J DanJ NRONcom PM Chris Could you find out if Patina has performed a gas analysis on the zone to be completed at your new well Ifwhen you receive a gas analysis our operations guys like to review this data for all new interconnects obviously this information is kept confidential Thanks Dan PS As we approach an inservice date which is estimated to be during the first half of December lets get together with Mark Whitt to discuss and coordinate gathering and marketing strategies This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
